name: UL Sport Gym
description: With over a hundred pieces of equipment, this is a very comprehensive gym well equipped to deal with the needs of all types of individuals ranging from elite sports people to members of the general public.
location: University of Limerick, Castletroy, Limerick V94XT66
facilities: Free weights area with 700kg of weight plates
Over thirty five resistance training stations
rules: Gym users must be over 14 Years of Age
Parental consent and ID required for 14-17 year olds
Code of conduct must be respected at all times
